summary:
Some one told Larry there was easy loot to be had in Henrik's Tomb....could that be a Lie?
New Dungeon featuring a Unique weapon and new spell.
descriptionHtml:
THIS FILE IS NOW OUT OF DATE....I HAVE RELEASED A BETTER VERSION OF THIS MOD WITH MUCH MORE CONTENT CALLED
#HENRIKS TOMB Revisited_LARRY'S LEGACY # WHICH INCLUDES THIS FILE!!!

CHECK IT OUT!!
(http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52885/?)


Someone told Larry there was easy loot to be had in Henrik's Tomb....could that be a Lie?

Discover what's lurking in Henrik's Tomb and see what has be fated poor Larry.

This is a new Dungeon located just south of Bleakfalls Barrow, it should appear on your map, inside contains a new frost spell called the "Cold Snap" and Larry's "lucky" sword, if you can defeat Henrik the Frozen.

This is my first dungeon so any comments or criticism's are welcome, I had originally intended to use this as one of three dungeon's but i thought I'd put this up first to see how it's received.

Installation:
I'm sure you all know this by now but just download and place in the skyrim data folder, and make sure it's checked in you mod manager or data file's in the launch window.

Only vanilla item's and texture's were used in it's creation so as long as you don't have a mode changing the area around Bleakfalls you should be golden.

Enjoy
author: GreenSmirf
